arts.ttl: GALLERY PART ONE: 10 of the best pics from Horwich as Wigan Athletic fans see their side remain unbeaten against Bolton Wanderers in 10 years!
arts.sum: Our man Bernard Platt was in and among the crowd at the Toughsheet Stadium as Wigan Athletic fans again enjoyed derby day with their side continuing their dominance over Bolton Wanderers.

arts.ttl: Player ratings - Bolton Wanderers v Wigan Athletic - 'Must love playing in Horwich'...Paul Kendrick's derby-day ratings
arts.sum: Paul Kendrick runs the rule over the Wigan Athletic side that beat near-neighbours Bolton Wanderers at the Toughsheet Stadium and delivers his report card.

arts.ttl: Bolton Wanderers boss offers leftfield take on wretched record against Wigan Athletic
arts.sum: Ian Evatt bemoaned the 'continuing theme' of Bolton Wanderers underperforming in the derby against a Wigan Athletic side that 'always seem to find their best football against us'.

arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic chief reacts to 'best ever' win over Bolton Wanderers
arts.sum: Shaun Maloney says Wigan Athletic were rewarded for 'going for' Bolton Wanderers as they continued their derby dominance at the Toughsheet Stadium.

arts.ttl: Impressive Wigan enjoy victory over local rivals Bolton
arts.sum: Wigan have held the upper hand in this fixture.

arts.ttl: REPORT: Bolton Wanderers 0 Wigan Athletic 2 - Tics continue derby dominance over Trotters
arts.sum: A goal in either half from Dale Taylor and Thelo Aasgaard ensured Wigan Athletic continued their derby dominance over Bolton Wanderers with a 2-0 scoreline that flattered the Horwich men hugely.

arts.ttl: Saturday's League One predictions including Bolton Wanderers vs. Wigan Athletic
arts.sum: Sports Mole provides score predictions and previews for all of today's League One fixtures, including Bolton Wanderers vs. Wigan Athletic.

arts.ttl: How Bolton Wanderers could line up against Wigan Athletic
arts.sum: A look at how Wanderers could line up against Wigan this weekend

arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic: Seven changes in our expected team v Bolton Wanderers
arts.sum: Paul Kendrick runs the rule over the Wigan Athletic squad and predicts the 11 men who Shaun Maloney will select to start against Bolton Wanderers at the Toughsheet Stadium this weekend.

arts.ttl: Callum McManaman on why proud 10-year record will fuel Wigan Athletic at Bolton Wanderers
arts.sum: Callum McManaman needs no reminder of the last time Wigan Athletic lost in the league to near-neighbours Bolton Wanderers.
